trans-unit.source: Being a very small wrapper around webassets, there are only a few options that you may need.
trans-unit.target: Being a very small wrapper around webassets , there are only a few options that you may need.

trans-unit.source: By default, if pelican is in DEBUG mode, pelican-webassets will not process any assets, helping you with debugging. To override this behavior, set WEBASSETS_DEBUG = True to process files regardless of the DEBUG flag.
trans-unit.target: By default, if pelican is in DEBUG mode, pelican-webassets will not process any assets, helping you with debugging. To override this behavior, set WEBASSETS_DEBUG = True to process files regardless of the DEBUG flag.

trans-unit.target: For a more complete list, check out the included filters section in their documentation.

trans-unit.target: If your raw assets are in directories other than your THEME_STATIC_PATHS , you can supply additional directories to search in with WEBASSETS_SOURCE_PATHS .

trans-unit.source: Some filters require extra configuration options to function properly. You can use WEBASSETS_CONFG to specify these options in a list of (key, value) tuples that are passed along to the webassets’ environment.

trans-unit.source: Then add the plugin to your list of PLUGINS in your pelicanconf.py file to include the plugin in your next pelican build.
trans-unit.target: Then add the plugin to your list of PLUGINS in your pelicanconf.py file to include the plugin in your next pelican build.

trans-unit.source: This plugin allows you to use webassets (a popular asset management application for Python web development) to manage your CSS and JavaScript assets for your Pelican powered static website.
trans-unit.target: This plugin allows you to use webassets (a popular asset management application for Python web development) to manage your CSS and JavaScript assets for your Pelican powered static website.
